Actions.Name: Pacifying Spores
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes are pacified, then must save or take [D]+[fray], or just [fray] damage on a successful save. Pacified foes take double damage.

Actions.Name: Morpheus
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is pacified and must save. On a failed save, they become so sleepy that they cannot attack, dash, fly, or teleport on their following turn, then this effect ends.
